```{r}
library(fastml)

data(iris)
iris <- iris[iris$Species != "setosa", ]
iris$Species = factor(iris$Species)

# train model
model <- fastml(data = iris, 
                label = "Species", 
                algorithms = "all")
summary(model)
```
